channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report E-2023070424
item.description:
Report E-2023070424

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-05T21:09:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-15
  • City: BUTTE
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: During off loading it was discovered that the load had shifted during transit and that one case of nu-brite (un2920) had been damaged by a sharp object and that one of the inner poly 1 gallon bottles had released 1 ounce of product. The warehouse crew was able to contain and cleanup the release, so no contractors were dispatched.
